name: Extra options for SynDaver and Lulzbot printers
author: SynDaver Labs, Inc.

material_part_removal_temperature.description: The ideal bed temperature to remove the model after printing.
material_part_removal_temperature.label: Part Removal Temperature

material_keep_part_removal_temperature.label: Keep Heating
material_keep_part_removal_temperature.description: Keep temperature after print on removal value

machine_probe_type.label: Probe Type
machine_probe_type.description: The type of probe used on the machine

material_probe_temperature.description: The nozzle temperature used before probing.
material_probe_temperature.label: Probe Temperature

material_soften_temperature.description: The nozzle temperature used before z-axis homing.
material_soften_temperature.label: Soften Temperature

material_wipe_temperature.description: The nozzle temperature used before nozzle wiping.
material_wipe_temperature.label: Wipe Temperature

machine_head_with_fans_x_min.label: X Min
machine_head_with_fans_x_min.description: Negative distance from the left of the printhead to the center of the nozzle. Used to prevent collisions between previous prints and the printhead when printing "One at a Time"

machine_head_with_fans_y_min.label: Y Min
machine_head_with_fans_y_min.description: Negative distance from the front of the printhead to the center of the nozzle. Used to prevent collisions between previous prints and the printhead when printing "One at a Time"

machine_head_with_fans_x_max.label: X Max
machine_head_with_fans_x_max.description: Positive distance from the right of the printhead to the center of the nozzle. Used to prevent collisions between previous prints and the printhead when printing "One at a Time"

machine_head_with_fans_y_max.label: Y Max
machine_head_with_fans_y_max.description: Positive distance from the rear of the printhead to the center of the nozzle. Used to prevent collisions between previous prints and the printhead when printing "One at a Time"
